Proven track record developing high-performance web apps and strategic initiatives

  • Fleetio

    Senior Frontend Developer · Fleetio

    Led the migration of Fleetio’s website from Ruby on Rails to React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, focusing on building a robust system of reusable components using Storybook. Traveled to React conferences to stay ahead of emerging technologies, incorporating new practices that enhanced the project’s performance, accessibility, and SEO. This hands-on approach ensured the website consistently exceeded industry standards.

Collaborated with analysts to conduct A/B testing, refining the user journey based on data-driven insights. Focused on optimizing performance, accessibility, and delivering a seamless user experience.

  • Fleetio Blog

    Senior Frontend Developer · Fleetio

    Developed the Fleetio blog with a focus on SEO by implementing pagination instead of infinite scroll, ensuring better indexing and performance. Integrated Contentful to allow non-developer teams to create and manage content effortlessly, reducing the development workload and enabling more time to focus on optimization in other areas. This approach streamlined cross-team collaboration and improved the overall efficiency of the content pipeline.

The system was designed with full accessibility in mind, adhering to WCAG AAA standards. The reusable component library enabled developers to build cohesive, accessible interfaces with minimal technical support, empowering teams to maintain a unified brand across the state’s digital platforms.

services Explained

Brainstorm & Plan

We’ll kick things off by discussing your project’s goals, audience, and key features. Together, we’ll create a plan to guide the project toward success.

Design Together

I’ll bring your ideas to life through wireframes and visual mockups using tools like Figma or Adobe XD. This ensures we’re on the same page before development starts.

Pick the Right Tools

I’ll help you select the best technologies for your project’s needs and future growth. Whether it’s React, Next.js, or something simpler, I’ll guide you through the options.

Build & Launch

Once we’ve nailed down the design and tech stack, I’ll develop your application with regular updates, making sure everything runs smoothly from start to finish.

Start Your Project
